title: 渲染器Chunky 1.1.14
author: pogox
txt_content:
发布时间：2013.9.16
官网下载地址：http://www.reddit.com/r/chunky/comments/1mffnh/version_1114_released/无需翻墙，请尽量支持作者。
国内备用下载：http://dl.vmall.com/c0g2mr3o1u
更新信息：Release Notes
This is a quick release to fix an issue with worlds saved in snapshot 13w36a and later versions due to a slight change in the Minecraft NBT format.
ChangeLog
Fixed problem reading NBT data generated by snapshot 13w36a (1.7)
* Always read list length of NBT lists and allow empty lists to have TAG_End as element type
* Added camera roll setting
* Fixed gray wool having the same texture as light gray wool
* Added minecraftDir option to Chunky config file
摘要译文：因新版本游戏NBT格式出现一些改变，所以修复对快照13w36a（1.7）之后的存档兼容。新增镜头旋转功能。本版本仍旧没有mac专版。mac用户可以尝试使用跨平台绿色版。修复少量材质bug。
附
上一版本1.1.13http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-152014-1-1.html
chunky使用教程http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-71574-1-1.html
